oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Studio Recording of Bill Compton's "Easy as We Can'" - "Once in a Lifetime Love"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Bill Compton (musician). The recording features Bill Compton performing: "Easy as We Can," and "Once in a Lifetime Love." Recordings are from a variety of unidentified dates.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Compton
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Easy as We Can (Bill Compton) -- (03:41) Once in a Lifetime Love (Bill Compton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Compton, Bill;
